summary: In the midst of a tropical storm, the crew of an offshore oil rig must survive the rampage of a creature after invading its undersea habitat.
cast: William Forsythe|Stacey Hinnen|Serah D'Laine|Marcus T. Paulk|Carmen Gloria Pérez|Daniel Benson|Robert Zachar|Scott Martin|Darren Scott|Eric Bivens-Bush|Jacob Bruce|Dennis LaValle|Art LaFleur
title: The Rig
